mapper.insert: insert into details(detailsid , ordercode , goodsid , price , num ) values(#{detailsid} , #{ordercode} , #{goodsid} , #{price} , #{num} )
mapper.update: update details set ordercode=#{ordercode} , goodsid=#{goodsid} , price=#{price} , num=#{num} where detailsid=#{detailsid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.goodsname , b.image from details a , goods b where a.goodsid = b.goodsid order by detailsid desc
